description: Fired when an entity's turn begins.

payloadSchema.title: Core: Turn Started Event Payload
payloadSchema.description: Defines the payload structure for the 'core:turn_started' event.

entityId.description: The unique ID of the entity whose turn is starting.

entityType.description: Indicates whether the entity starting the turn is a player or an AI.

entity.description: The full entity object for additional context (e.g., determining player subtype).
